results.name: Number of proper divisors of form 4k+3.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} x^(8*k-2) / (1 - x^(4*k-1)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 14 2021
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 19 2017
